name: Dead Drop
storyline:
Dead Drop is the 19th game in the Carol Reed series.

Erik has been drafted by an anonymous client to gather seemingly trivial information about the government agency that he works for. At first, he finds his new tasks compelling, and finds good use for the extra money. But when it starts to get more complex and bordering on the illegal, he realizes that it's too late to pull out. He contacts Carol to help him terminate his assignment, and find out what his client's real motivations are.
summary:
Dead Drop is the 19th game in the Carol Reed series.

The game is 100% mouse driven and features a classic adventure game interface.
There is absolutely no need to have played any of the previous games in the Carol Reed series to fully enjoy Dead Drop.

The game takes place is Sweden, but it is in English. All dialogues have subtitles.
The game contains no graphic violence or any swearing. It has no action elements, and is suitable for ages 15 and up.
